PluginData.Author: Merii
PluginData.Tooltip: It's a lot like Isy's Inventory Manager and uses a similar config language, but is entirely client side, so there is no server load except the actual item transfers, unlike with programmable blocks.
PluginData.Description: Pure client-side inventory management - see https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=3122025230 for usage
